i1.name: Living Forge
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Ornn''' gains an additional {{sti|armor|{{as|10% '''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|10% '''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} from all sources.

{{sbc|Living Forge:}} '''Ornn''' can purchase non-[[Consumable item|consumable]] [[items]] from anywhere on the field by forging them himself, and is also presented a ''Forge Menu'' with his recommended items to select to be ''forged''. {{tip|channel|Forging}} takes 4 seconds and the process is interrupted if '''Ornn''' enters combat, disabling ''Living Forge''.

{{sbc|Master Craftman:}} When '''Ornn''' reaches level 12, any upgradable ({{sbc|Masterwork}}) item '''Ornn''' owns or purchases for the rest of the game is upgraded for free, up to a maximum of 2. Additionally, for each level after 12 (level 13, 14, 15 and 16), '''Ornn''' can upgrade one of his ally's upgradable items ({{sbc|Masterwork}}) by getting within 600 range of them and clicking on them, up to a maximum of 1 per ally.
* {{sbc|Masterwork}} items: 
** {{sbc|Attack Damage Items:}} {{ii|Might of the Ruined King}}, {{ii|Molten Edge}}, {{ii|Obsidian Cleaver}}, {{ii|Trinity Fusion}}, {{ii|Youmuu's Wraithblade}}.
** {{sbc|Ability Power Items:}} {{ii|Luden's Pulse}}, {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcrown}}, {{ii|Zhonya's Paradox}}.
** {{sbc|Tank Items:}} {{ii|Forgefire Cape}}, {{ii|Frozen Fist}}, {{ii|Infernal Mask}}.
** {{sbc|Support Items:}} {{ii|Circlet of the Iron Solari}}, {{ii|Salvation}}.
{{sbc|Temper:}} '''Ornn's''' basic attacks against {{tip|Brittle}} enemies briefly {{tip|airborne|knocks them back}}.

Enemies made {{tip|Brittle}} by '''Ornn''' take {{as|{{pp|key=%|type=Ornn's level|12 to 20.5}} of their '''maximum''' health}} as {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} the next time they are {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}} by '''Ornn''' or his allies, consuming ''Brittle''.
i1.notes:
* {{g|Gold}} is only deducted upon completing the channel.
* The reduction in Tenacity will benefit all applicable types of crowd control, not just immobilizes. Effects such as slows, blinds and silences will be empowered without consuming the debuff.
* Despite the in-game tooltip attribute ''Brittle'' to {{ai|Bellows Breath|Ornn}}, it is not required to rank Bellows Breath in order to benefit from the effect. 
* {{pending for test}} The bonus magic damage inflicted by ''Brittle'' is credited to '''Ornn'''.
* Mastercraft items and their components are not the same item and so in theory any unnamed passives would stack and any unnamed actives would only put themselves on cooldown upon activated. This is however not true. Actives will always place their counterpart on cooldown, and passives are inconsistent: 
** The {{sti|Heal and Shield Power}} from {{ii|Redemption}} and {{ii|Salvation}} stack, granting 20% when having them together.
** {{ii|The Black Cleaver}} and {{ii|The Obsidian Cleaver}} apply each 1 stack (for a total of 2) per instance of physical damage.
** The bonus on-hit damage from {{ii|Blade of the Ruined King}} and {{ii|Might of the Ruined King}} do not stack.
** The auras of {{ii|Abyssal Mask}} and {{ii|Infernal Mask}} do not stack.
** The passive of {{ii|Infinity Edge}} and {{ii|Molten Edge}} do not stack.
** Both passives of {{ii|Youmuu's Ghostblade}} and {{ii|Youmuu's Wraithblade}} do not stack.
** The passive of {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcap}} and {{ii|Rabadon's Deathcrown}} do not stack, and ''Deathcap's'' passive will state that it grants 0 AP while using the item.

q1.name: Volcanic Rupture
description: {{sbc|Active:}}  '''Ornn''' slams the ground, sending a fissure in the target direction that stops at maximum range or 200 units behind a hit enemy champion, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

After a {{fd|1.125}}-second delay, a '''{{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn|magma pillar}}''' erupts at maximum range, {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} enemies hit and lingering as impassible terrain for 4 seconds.
''The '''pillar''' will not expire while '''Ornn''' is {{ai|Searing Charge|Ornn|charging}}.''
q1.notes:
* The fissure will move an 200 units beyond the first champion it hits, not exceeding the maximum range of the ability. ''It can still damage additional targets.''
* The '''pillar''''s formation applies brief displacement. Doing so consumes all stacks of brittle on the displaced targets.
* The eruption will occur in front of {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}}.
* If launched in a wall, pillar will try to appear on the other side of the wall, if it cannot the pillar will be destroyed.

w1.name: Bellows Breath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ornn''' marches {{tip|Unstoppable|unstoppably}} in the target direction with 35% reduced movement speed for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
Over the march he belches fire over a cone in front of him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.15}} seconds to enemies hit. The final bout of flame will apply {{tip|Brittle}} for 3 seconds.
''Bellows Breath'' has a minimum damage threshold, which is also the damage dealt to minions. Monsters take modified damage, as well.
w1.notes:
* The belch deals 5 instances of damage.
* The final instance of damage will be blocked by spell shields and won't apply ''Brittle''.

e1.name: Searing Charge
description: {{sbc|Active:}}  '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|charges}} forward, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies he passes through, stopping upon colliding with terrain.

If '''Ornn''' collides with terrain while charging he creates a shockwave that deals the same damage and {{tip|airborne|knocks up}} enemies within for 1 second. Enemies can only be damaged once by ''Searing Charge''.
The shockwave destroys '''{{ai|Volcanic Rupture|Ornn|Magma pillars}}''' and partially destroys terrain created by enemy champions.
e1.notes: * Spell shields will block one instance of damage.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 40% bonus armor) (+ 40% bonus magic resistance)

r1.name: Call of the Forge God
description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Ornn''' summons an elemental at maximum range in the target direction that stampedes toward him, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|slow|slowing}} enemies hit for 2 seconds, as well as applying {{tip|Brittle}} for 3 seconds. The {{tip|slow}} scales with the distance traveled by the elemental, with a minimum of 10%.
While stampeding, '''Ornn''' can re-activate ''Call of the Forge God''.

{{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Ornn''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} 300 units in the target direction. If '''Ornn''' collides with the elemental, he headbutts it, sending it stampeding again in the new direction and empowering it to {{tip|airborne|knock up}} enemies hit for 1 second, reduced to {{fd|0.5}} seconds after the first enemy champion hit. ''Call of the Forge God'' can affect enemies twice and applies {{tip|Brittle}} on each hit.
r1.notes:
* The second cast cannot be activated while grounded and will be interrupted by knockdown.
* The dash on the second cast cannot be used to pass through persistent terrain.
* If '''Ornn''' does not use or misses the elemental on the second cast, the elemental will continue ~500 units behind the cast location. 
* Spell shields will block one instance of damage.
<!--* The elemental is classified as a [[Champion summoned units|champion summoned unit]] and not a projectile. The elemental is immune to crowd control effects, meaning it will not be affected by {{ai|Steadfast Presence|Poppy}} or {{ai|Emperor's Divide|Azir}}.-->
